attributes.action: Add 'None of the above' as an option on all future election ballot papers
attributes.additional_details: For evidence you only have to look at the trend for progressively lower voter turnout at elections, which allows a majority rule from a minority of voters who showed up.
attributes.background: Every time there is an election a large proportion of voters fail to turn up, showing voter apathy. Adding a 'none of the above' option allows voters to register their protest vote in a meaningful way that can be counted and reported on at election time.
